org.codehaus.preon
Class CodecConstructionException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          java.lang.RuntimeException
              org.codehaus.preon.CodecConstructionException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CodecConstructionException
extends RuntimeException

The exception thrown when a CodecFactory fails to construct a Codec. See different constructors for the situations in which this exception might be thrown.

Author:
Wilfred Springer
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Summary
CodecConstructionException(BindingException be)
          Constructs an exception for the case in which the CodecFactory fails to bind the expression to the context.
CodecConstructionException(InvalidExpressionException ice)
          Constructs an exception for the case in which the CodecFactory fails to parse the expression.
CodecConstructionException(String message)

Constructor Detail

CodecConstructionException

public CodecConstructionException(InvalidExpressionException ice)
Constructs an exception for the case in which the CodecFactory fails to parse the expression.

Parameters:
ice - The exception containing the details about the reason why it turned out to be impossible to build an interpreter for an expression.

CodecConstructionException

public CodecConstructionException(BindingException be)
Constructs an exception for the case in which the CodecFactory fails to bind the expression to the context.

Parameters:
ice - The exception containing the details about the reason why it turned out to be impossible to build an interpreter for an expression.
